author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Southern Baptist Convention settles high-profile lawsuit that accused…
text:
Summary by Ground News Duane Rollins filed a lawsuit accusing Paul Pressler, a longtime Southern Baptist figure and former Texas judge, of decades of rape. The suit prompted at least seven other men to come forward with their own allegations of sexual misconduct by Pressler. Pressler denies the allegations and has not been criminally charged for any of the alleged abuses. Share menu More
